title: Classic Minesweeper
titleText: Take a nostalgic trip back to the 90's with Minesweeper! Soon to be optimzed for desktop!
modalText: This is a mobile first school project that has not yet been optimized for different screen sizes. There are only 2 difficulty levels right now but I would like to eventually add a "hard" level for larger screen sizes.

title: Pig Game
titleText: Be too greedy and you'll lose! This 2 player game is a game of chance and greed!
modalText: This is a mobile first school project that has not yet been optimized for different screen sizes. I had previously built this game with Jonas Schmedtmann for an Udemy course so I want to give him some credit for some of the logic and even design.

title: Classic Memory
titleText: Play this game with a friend too see who has a better memory! More tile choices coming for kids!
modalText: This is a mobile first school project that has not yet been optimized for different screen sizes. I would like to eventually add a "hard" level and also choices of tiles for kids so my children can play!

title: Rock, Papper, Scissors
titleText: Are you too attached to your phone to put it down long enough to play rock, papper, scissors with your hands? I have you covered!
modalText: This is a mobile first school project that has not yet been optimized for different screen sizes.

title: Guess the Number
titleText: Have you often thought that you are psychic? Try this simple game where all you need to do is guess a randomly generated number.
modalText: This is a mobile first school project that has not yet been optimized for different screen sizes. The game allows the player to choose the range and the number of guesses.
